subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Mark Streit, Matt Moulson and Frans Nielsen each had three points as the Islanders beat the Devils, 6-2, in a preseason game at Nassau Coliseum.
snippet: Mark Streit, Matt Moulson and Frans Nielsen each had three points as the Islanders beat the Devils, 6-2, in a preseason game at Nassau Coliseum.
